properties.description: Store maximum height of toggle menu
properties.name: _windowHeight

properties.description: Togglemenu deploy behavior respect below items               Values can be: regard or overlap               Default: regard
properties.name: deploy

properties.description: Togglemenu size adjust               Values can be: complete or fit               Default: complete
properties.name: occupy

methods.description: Check if the default element style should be applied
methods.name: _setDefaultStyle

methods.description: Set adapted height to content when is not on 100% for to be possible deploy animation
methods.name: _setDisplayHeight

methods.description: Set height and width of the togglemenu
methods.name: _setMeasurements

methods.description: Set up declarative user togglemenu items
methods.name: _setupItems

methods.description: Set up span with value of item
methods.name: _setupSpan

methods.description: Add new togglemenu node item programmatically
methods.name: addItem

methods.description: Remove node item passed as parameter
methods.name: removeItem

methods.description: Replace old node item with a new one
methods.name: replaceItem
